thread.title: VERBATIM: Terror survivor gets royal wedding invite

title: VERBATIM: Terror survivor gets royal wedding invite
text:
VERBATIM: Terror survivor gets royal wedding invite 10:19pm IST - 01:02 
12-year-old Amelia Thompson, a survivor of the suicide attack at a pop concert in Manchester last year, has received an invitation to the wedding of Britain's Prince Harry and Meghan Markle. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
12-year-old Amelia Thompson, a survivor of the suicide attack at a pop concert in Manchester last year, has received an invitation to the wedding of Britain's Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.
